package_info.mp_subtitle: The module that brings a translation tool for your websites

mp_description.p: MelisSiteTranslation allows your site's translation files to be overridden and edited directly by administrators in the back office without any need of developers or to edit the files.
It comes with a tool and a service to use in your website.
